summary: Frontend UI/UX testing completed for The Vault Club DeFi platform. All requested UI enhancements verified working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI/UX enhancements verified working: 1) Future+ tab removed from homepage timeline - only 1W, 1M, 1Y, All tabs present, 2) Homepage shows smooth SVG curve chart with Deposits (purple) and Earnings (green) legend, 3) '$0.00 Earned This Week' displays correctly when no contract selected, 4) 'No contract selected' empty state with 'Select a contract to view earnings' message shown, 5) Bottom navigation buttons are bigger with p-3 padding and w-5 h-5 icons, 6) Data page shows 'Averaged Earnings Rate' (not RRL-Averaged), 7) Future page bar chart displays with purple->orange gradient bars (purple for early years, orange for wBTC phase), 8) Wallet page shows 'Personal Wallet' title with 'Manage your non-custodial wallet' subtitle, 9) No RRL or 'Routed Reinvestment Logic' text found anywhere on the website, 10) ToS modal content verified clean of RRL references.

homepage_timeline_tabs.details: Only 1W, 1M, 1Y, All tabs present - Future+ removed correctly

homepage_curve_chart.details: SVG smooth curve chart with Deposits and Earnings legend displayed

homepage_earnings_display.details: '$0.00 Earned This Week' displays correctly when no contract selected

homepage_empty_state.details: 'No contract selected' message with 'Select a contract to view earnings' shown

bottom_nav_button_size.details: Navigation buttons have p-3 padding and w-5 h-5 icons (bigger than before)

future_page_bar_chart.details: Bar chart with purple->orange gradient bars (purple for early years Y1-Y5, orange for wBTC phase Y10-Y15)

wallet_page_subtitle.details: 'Personal Wallet' title with 'Manage your non-custodial wallet' subtitle

no_rrl_references.details: No RRL or 'Routed Reinvestment Logic' text found on any page (Home, Wallet, Contracts, Data, Future)

tos_modal_clean.details: ToS modal content verified clean of RRL references via code review

screenshots_taken: homepage_test.png - Shows timeline tabs (1W, 1M, 1Y, All), curve chart with Deposits/Earnings legend, $0.00 Earned, No contract selected state
wallet_page_full.png - Shows 'Personal Wallet' with 'Manage your non-custodial wallet' subtitle
future_page_full.png - Shows bar chart with purple->orange gradient bars
